item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: October 29, 2024 Today's Verse Galatians 3:24â€“26 [24] So then, the law was our guardian until Christ came, in order that we might be justified by faith. [25] But now that faith has come, we are no longer under a guardian, [26] for in Christ Jesus you are all sons of God, through faith. This Year's Memory Verse Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth.
